name: Wired Up
description:
Wired Up is a simulation of a nonsensical user interface. 

You are a new Engineer upon a great Space Ship. Your duty is to wire up the ship's systems to support it's resource needs. You are armed with only your wit and your trusty Employee Handbook. Good Luck!

REMINDER: There is a PDF included with the exe named "Employee Handbook". When you are confused during gameplay, please refer to it.

Controls

  • Mouse to move cursor
  • Left Click to place wire end, pickup wire end, and move switch.

Created By

  • Alex Wilkinson
  • Wesley Pesetti
  • Rhen Niles
  • Corbin Mcbride
  • Cassie Helwick
